description: A discord bot that greets people when they join the server.

24.12: Today is Christmas Eve. Merry Christmas!
Ho ho ho! It's Christmas Eve!
01.01: Today is New Year's Day. Happy New Year!
14.02: Today is Valentine's Day. Happy Valentine's Day!
04.05: It's Star Wars Day. May the 4th be with you!
May the force be with you. It's Star Wars Day!
19.09: Today is Talk Like a Pirate Day!
Today is Talk Like a Pirate Day. Ar ar ar!
